Epstein, who reportedly runs a multibillion-dollar investment fund, travels in his own Boeing 727 (upon w he has transported Bill Clinton to Africa) and owns a 45,000-square-foot m on Manhattan's Upper East Side. text_blocks.content: Billionaire In Palm Beach Sex Scandal - July 26, 2006

called the moneyman a "terrific guy" who "likes beautiful women as much as and many of them are on the younger side." Epstein, who reportedly runs a multibillion-dollar investment fund, travels in his own Boeing 727 (upon w he has transported Bill Clinton to Africa) and owns a 45,000-square-foot m on Manhattan's Upper East Side. (22 pages)

additional_notes: The document appears to be a page from a report or investigation document related to a sex scandal involving a billionaire in Palm Beach. The page contains a mix of printed and handwritten text. The handwritten text is found in two places: a checkbox next to 'E-mail story to a friend' and a date '7/27/2006' next to 'Public Records Request'.
